mapper.insert: insert into scrap (user_idx, board_idx, create_at) values (#{userIdx}, #{boardIdx}, now())
mapper.select: select s.board_idx as boardIdx, f.title as title, u.nickname as nickname, u.user_idx as userIdx from scrap s join feed f on s.board_idx = f.board_idx join user u on s.user_idx = u.user_idx where s.user_idx = #{userIdx} order by s.create_at desc;
mapper.delete: delete from scrap where user_idx = #{userIdx} and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into feed_like (user_idx, board_idx, create_at) values (#{userIdx}, #{boardIdx}, now())
mapper.update: update feed set likes = likes + 1 where boardIdx=#{boardIdx}
update feed set likes = likes - 1 where boardIdx=#{boardIdx}
mapper.select: select user_idx as userIdx, nickname as nickname, introduce as introduce from user where (nickname like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or email like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') ) and deleted is null limit #{pageNum}, 5
select count(*) from user where (nickname like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or email like CONCAT('%', #{searchContent}, '%') ) and deleted is null
select count(*) from following f left join user u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx group BY f.user_idx HAVING f.user_idx = #{userIdx};
select count(*) from following f left join user u on f.following_idx = u.user_idx group by f.following_idx having f.following_idx = #{userIdx};
